task.title: Add User
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps for adding a new RemoteTM user.

step.cmd: Click Settings Manage Users in main toolbar.
In the Manage Users dialog, click the Add User button.
step.stepresult: The Add User dialog appears: Add user Dialog

step.cmd: Type a unique identification code for the new user in the User ID text input.
step.info: Only Latin characters, numbers, underscores or the '@' sign should be used in a User ID.

step.cmd: Type the name of the user in the Name text input.
Select a role for the user from the Role drop-down list. Available options are:

chrow.chdesc: User that can manage the RemoteTM server without restrictions.
User that can create translation memories and assign use rights to other users.
User with access restricted to assigned translation memories.

step.cmd: Type the email address to use for sending notifications to the user in the Email text input.

info.note: If the email address of the user is invalid, sending the initial login credentials will fail and the user will not be created.

taskbody.result: An email with login credentials is sent to the new user and the user account is created.
